name: Rob
description:
Rob loves to eat. He eats everything he finds, so you better keep him away from… Well, everything he can fit in his mouth really. Apart from that he´s a really nice guy. Well, I think he´s a guy. If he was a girl, he probably wouldn´t slobber that much. Or at least he´d dry it off.

Anyways, I hope you´d like to adopt Rob.
He´s very friendly and rarely bites.

***

Rob is made of fleece and felt. His measurements are 22cm by 16cm, or 9” by 6”. All details are hand stitched. Guaranteed smoke free.
